entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has the ability to fly. He is trying to keep his flying a secret from Harry.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a bank that stores valuable treasures and has high-security vaults guarded by dragons.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is eager to see more magic.

entities.name: dragons
entities.description: Dragons are guarding the high-security vaults of Gringotts bank.

relationships.description: Hagrid is warning Harry about the dangers of trying to rob Gringotts, which has dragons guarding its high-security vaults.
Hagrid is instructing Harry on the dangers of trying to rob Gringotts bank.
